  9 require 'date'
 10 
 11 ### Add some to_ical methods to classes
 12 
 13 # class Object
 14 #   def to_ical
 15 #     raise(NotImplementedError, "This object does not implement the to_ical method!")
 16 #   end
 17 # end
 18 
 19 require 'uri/generic'
 20 
 21 class String
 22   def to_ical
 23     "#{self}"
 24   end
 25 end
 26 
 27 class Fixnum
 28   def to_ical
 29     "#{self}"
 30   end
 31 end
 32 
 33 class Float
 34   def to_ical
 35     "#{self}"
 36   end
 37 end
 38 
 39 # From the spec: "Values in a list of values MUST be separated by a COMMA
 40 # character (US-ASCII decimal 44)."
 41 class Array
 42   def to_ical
 43     map{|elem| elem.to_ical}.join ','
 44   end
 45 end
 46 
 47 module URI
 48   class Generic
 49     def to_ical
 50       "#{self}"
 51     end
 52   end
 53 end
 54 
 55 class DateTime < Date
 56   def to_ical(utc = false)
 57     s = ""
 58     
 59     # 4 digit year
 60     s << self.year.to_s
 61     
 62     # Double digit month
 63     s << "0" unless self.month > 9 
 64     s << self.month.to_s
 65     
 66     # Double digit day
 67     s << "0" unless self.day > 9 
 68     s << self.day.to_s
 69 
 70     s << "T"
 71         
 72     # Double digit hour
 73     s << "0" unless self.hour > 9 
 74     s << self.hour.to_s
 75     
 76     # Double digit minute
 77     s << "0" unless self.min > 9 
 78     s << self.min.to_s
 79     
 80     # Double digit second
 81     s << "0" unless self.sec > 9 
 82     s << self.sec.to_s
 83 
 84     # UTC time gets a Z suffix
 85     if utc
 86       s << "Z"
 87     end
 88 
 89     s
 90   end
 91 end
 92 
 93 class Date
 94   def to_ical(utc = false)
 95     s = ""
 96         
 97     # 4 digit year
 98     s << self.year.to_s
 99     
100     # Double digit month
101     s << "0" unless self.month > 9 
102     s << self.month.to_s
103     
104     # Double digit day
105     s << "0" unless self.day > 9 
106     s << self.day.to_s
107   end
108 end
109 
110 class Time
111   def to_ical(utc = false)
112     s = ""
113 
114     # Double digit hour
115     s << "0" unless self.hour > 9 
116     s << self.hour.to_s
117     
118     # Double digit minute
119     s << "0" unless self.min > 9 
120     s << self.min.to_s
121     
122     # Double digit second
123     s << "0" unless self.sec > 9 
124     s << self.sec.to_s
125 
126     # UTC time gets a Z suffix
127     if utc
128       s << "Z"
129     end
130 
131     s
132   end
133 end
